channel.title: Kafka on yrong blog
channel.description: Recent content in Kafka on yrong blog

item.title: kafka in depth analysis
item.author: yrong@ustc.edu (Ronyang)
item.description: Terminology Broker Kafka集群包含一个或多个服务器，这种服务器被称为broker Topic 每条发布到Kafka集群的消息都有一个类别，这个类别被称为Topic。

item.title: kafka-streams
item.author: yrong@ustc.edu (Ronyang)
item.description: kafka-streams This is the repository for the examples of using Kafka streams covered in the blog posts: Kafka Streams - The Processor API Kafka Streams - The KStreams API Machine Learning with Kafka Streams Requirements to build this project Java 8 Gradle Requirements to run the examples kafka version kafka_2.11-0.10.1.0 see the section marked “Running a task on a particular version of Scala” The json-data-generator from ACES,Inc Setup Instructions Extact the kafka_2.
